oai_dc:dc.dc:title: James A. Cayce Homes Units Nearing Completion, c.1940s
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of the James A. Cayce Homes looking down Sylvan Street, nearing completion. The Cayce Homes (Project Tenn. 5-1) were built between 1939 and 1941 as a white-oly community, designed by Marr & Holman. Photographed by the Nashville Housing Authority, c.1940s. Forms part of the MDHA Photograph Collection. 1 photograph : b & w.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Nashville Housing Authority (Nashville, Tenn.);
